meanings.definition: The quality of being suitable or appropriate for being presented to others.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit had a high level of presentableness, making her stand out at the party.
meanings.sent2: The presentableness of the artwork impressed the gallery visitors.
meanings.sent3: The dog's presentableness in a bowtie brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: His speech had a presentableness that captivated the audience's attention.
meanings.sent5: The presentableness of the cake made it the centerpiece of the dessert table.

meanings.definition: The state of being in a condition to be shown or displayed.
meanings.sent1: The presentableness of the car after the wash was remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The presentableness of the new product packaging caught the eye of customers.
meanings.sent3: The presentableness of the garden gnome made it a quirky addition to the yard.
meanings.sent4: The presentableness of the exhibit drew in a large crowd of art enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The presentableness of the bookshelf showcased the owner's collection beautifully.
